{{cpp/named req/navbar}}

{{named req|LayoutMappingPolicy}} is a type used to specify layout policy of {{c/core|std::mdspan}}. It provides a member alias template whose specialization is a {{named req|LayoutMapping}} type.

===Requirements===
A type {{tt|MP}} satisfies {{named req/core|LayoutMappingPolicy}} if the type requirements shown below are valid:

====Legend====
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Type|Definition}}
{{dsc|{{tt|MP}}|a layout mapping policy class}}
{{dsc|{{tt|M}}|a layout mapping class}}
{{dsc|{{tt|E}}|a specialization of {{c/core|std::extents}}}}
{{dsc end}}

====Type requirements====
* {{c/core|MP::mapping&lt;E&gt;}} is valid and denotes a type {{tt|M}} that satisfies {{named req|LayoutMapping}}.
* {{c/core|M::layout_type}} is valid and denotes a type {{tt|MP}}.
* {{c/core|M::extents_type}} is valid and denotes a type {{tt|E}}.

===Standard library===
The following standard library types satisfy {{named req/core|LayoutMappingPolicy}} requirements:
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/mdspan/dsc layout_left}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/mdspan/dsc layout_right}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/mdspan/dsc layout_stride}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/mdspan/dsc layout_left_padded}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/mdspan/dsc layout_right_padded}}
{{dsc namespace|std::linalg}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/numeric/linalg/dsc layout_transpose}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/numeric/linalg/dsc layout_blas_packed}}
{{dsc end}}
